definitions.definition: A sheet of paper or cardboard with a written or printed announcement on one side for display in a public place.
A public proclamation ; a manifesto or edict issued by authority .
Permission given by authority; a license.
An extra plate on the lower part of the breastplate or backplate of armour .
A kind of stomacher , often adorned with jewels, worn in the fifteenth century and later.
The woodwork and frame of the door of a closet etc.

main_definition: A sheet of paper or cardboard with a written or printed announcement on one side for display in a public place.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A public proclamation ; a manifesto or edict issued by authority .
( obsolete ) Permission given by authority; a license.
( historical ) An extra plate on the lower part of the breastplate or backplate of armour .
( historical ) A kind of stomacher , often adorned with jewels, worn in the fifteenth century and later.
The woodwork and frame of the door of a closet etc.
